meanings.definition: A device used to hold a pen while writing.
meanings.sent1: The penholder on my desk keeps my pen in place.
meanings.sent2: She placed the pen in the penholder before starting to write.
meanings.sent3: The penholder decided to take a break and let the pen do the writing for once.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a penholder, neatly organizing all her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The colorful penholder stood out on the plain desk, inviting creativity.

meanings.definition: A person who holds a pen.
meanings.sent1: The teacher, a skilled penholder, wrote neatly on the board.
meanings.sent2: As a penholder, he always had a pen ready for jotting down ideas.
meanings.sent3: The penholder at the signing event had a collection of unique pens.
meanings.sent4: She was a penholder of great ideas, always ready to put them on paper.
meanings.sent5: The young artist, a talented penholder, sketched effortlessly on the canvas.
